William and Maria Crompton B-1.

William Crompton Maria Crompton (nee Morgan) 1845 ? 1910 ? collier Ernest Crompton C-3 Emma Ada (who went to Africa) Ethel (who married Charles Barber) Alice Dora Crompton C-2 August 5, 1876 35 Barlow Street, Bradford Newton, Lancaster, England April 26, 1964 Edmonton, Alberta Dora went to visit her sister Ada in Africa, where she met & married Thomas Howells. Tom Crompton Harry Crompton
